name: screess
description: A stylesheet language that compiles down to a MapBox GL stylesheet
author: Lucas Wojciechowski <lucas@lucaswoj.com>

scripts.prepublish: npm run build-pegjs && npm run build-coffee && npm run build-browser
scripts.build-coffee: coffee --compile --output compiled source && cp source/parser.js compiled/parser.js
scripts.test: npm run build-pegjs && mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register tests
scripts.test-debug: npm run build && open http://127.0.0.1:8080/debug?port=5858 && mocha --debug-brk --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register tests
